chapter.title: Getting Started
chapter.para: The following sections describe how to integrate &dbpw; into an existing &dbpi; installation.
&dbpw; is provided as WAR file and can be easily integrated into an existing &dbpi; installation.

step.para: Copy the WAR file for &dbpw; (DocBridgePilotUI.war) within the &dbpi; installation into the directory [PILOT_INSTALL_DIR]/tomcat/webapps.

result.para: &dbpw; is directly available without a restart. In the address bar of your browser, enter http://localhost:8080/DocBridgePilotUI/ to access the web interface.
